title: Fauci Open to Covid-19 Booster Shots Sooner Than Eight Months
content:
1. Fauci Open to Covid-19 Booster Shots Sooner Than Eight Months  Bloomberg
  2. Health officials sticking with 8-month COVID booster shot timeline: Fauci  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Fauci: School Covid-19 vaccine mandates are a 'good idea'  CNN
  4. U.S. to stick with booster shot recommendation while promising to be ‘very flexible’ with the guidance  PennLive
  5. Fauci says US still planning for COVID-19 booster after 8 months. Biden said shots could be administered after 5.  Yahoo! Voices
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
